name: Wire Kit WSK-1: Top and Bottom Wall Mounts for 1/8” Material
brief_description: Gyford Wire Kits are a great way to get started with wire suspension for your signage and display projects. This comprehensive collection includes all the hardware for mounting a 1/8” thick piece of material for vertical signs or displays. The WSK-1 includes two turnbuckle mounts (bottom mounts), two static upper mounts, two 10’ spans of 3/64” wire and four panel grippers. The turnbuckle and static mounts may be installed in a floor-to-ceiling configuration or be articulated to a 90-degree angle for a wall-to-wall installation. These kits also include mounting screws for the top and bottom mounts. * Please note that this kit does not include signage panels.Includes:Two WS-A6BTwo WS-A6Four WS-AEVG-125Two 10’ long 3/64” WS-Wire lengths

brief_description: Fixed Aluminum Panel Hinge have lockable positioning and are available in two sizes. StandOff Panel Hinges hold two pieces of material at separate angles. They can be locked in place and fastened to your material with a cap or gripper. Once the hinges are fixed into the selected position, other StandOff components can be attached as needed. These hinges are an excellent solution for expanding the versatility of a design.Use with our standard aluminum caps for a finished look. Cap SO-CAP9 is compatible with this hinge.

name: StructureLite Profile Aluminum Bar (SL-BAR)
brief_description: The StructureLite Extrusion Bar comes in 8′ and 12′ lengths. The profile price includes up to four (4) cuts at no charge. More than four (4) cuts will incur fee(s). The StructureLite Extrusion Bar is made out of machined aluminum. Remnants will be recycled unless specified below; selecting to ship remnants will add shipping charges. Profile longer than 36″ will incur shipping fees. Additional lead time is required for cuts. Please indicate the length, number of cuts you want and the desired cut length (inches) for each piece.Installation Tip: Center holes can be drilled and tapped for 5/16-18 threads

name: StructureLite Profile Aluminum Bar w/ 1 slot (SL-PROF)
brief_description: StructureLite Single Slot Extrusion comes in 8′ and 12′ lengths, and the price includes up to four (4) cuts. More than four (4) cuts will incur additional fee(s). Remnants will be recycled unless specified below. Shipping remnants will increase shipping cost. Sections longer than 36″ will incur additional shipping fees. Additional lead time is required for all cuts. Please indicate the length, number of cuts you want and the desired cut length (inches) for each piece. For custom lengths and colors/finishes, speak with one of our Customer Solutions Specialists.Installation Tip: Center holes can be drilled and tapped for 5/16-18 threads

name: StructureLite Blade Sign Kit
description: Installation Video:
brief_description: The StructureLite Blade Sign Kit is a quick, out-of-the-box solution for interior sign mounting. Popular uses for this mounting kit include wayfinding and storefront signage, as well as departmental signs that would be used on a large campus or in a hospital. The mounting components in this kit may be assembled ahead of time before arriving to a job site for a quick installation. *Please note this kit does not include any signage or acrylic material.Included in the kit:(1) SL-SQPROFD Extrusion cut to 18 inches and drilled/tapped on one side(1) SL-ASQWMBL Mounting Plate(1) HD-LHD10S Zinc Plated Low Head Socket Cap Screw(2) EZ-AG Grippers(2) SL-CN1 Extrusion Nuts(2) HD-LHD7 Low Head Socket Cap Screw(1) SL-BLOX1.25EC Square Extrusion Cover(4) HD-FDA1 Nylon AnchorsWatch the instruction video below where our tech lead installs a blade sign using this kit.

name: StructureLite Custom Nuts for Slotted Profiles
brief_description: StructureLite Extrusion Nuts are aluminum nuts designed to fit into slotted StructureLite with a 5/16-18 threaded holes.

name: All Purpose Wall Anchors
brief_description: The All-Purpose Wall Anchor is a polypropylene all-purpose wall anchor for size #4 to #12 screws.

name: Plastic Insert for Slotted Profiles - Cover Strip (SL-PCS-72)
brief_description: StructureLite Cover Strip extrusion inserts are designed to be used with our StructureLite extrusion. The plastic inserts are designed to cover or reduce the slot opening in profiles to allow material to be held in place. Custom nuts are designed to fit into slotted extrusion to allow other components to be attached with a 5/16-18 threaded rod.

name: Plastic Insert for Slotted Profiles - Flexible Spline (SL-SPF)
brief_description: StructureLite Plastic Flexible Spline is designed to accommodate material 1/4″ thick and protect it from the profile’s metal edges. It is sold by the foot and can be cut to length.

name: Plastic Insert for Slotted Profiles - Rigid Spline (SL-SPR)
brief_description: StructureLite Rigid Plastic Spline is designed to secure 1/4″ material in slotted profile and protect it from the profile’s metal edges. It is available in 8′ lengths.

name: StructureLite Disc 2.5" Diameter (SL-A2.5DISC)
brief_description: The SL-A2.5DISC is an aluminum disc designed for use with 2-1/2″ diameter profile. It features a 5/16″ through hole.

name: WL Panel Grippers with Mounting Plate
brief_description: The WL Panel Gripper with Mounting Plate is designed to mount material perpendicular to a surface. The clip may be positioned at any angle. Panels are secured in place with a nylon tip set screw.Includes mounting hardware for attaching panel to wall. (HD-FDA1, HD-PS2)

name: Wire Suspension Panel Clips (WS-ASC)
brief_description: The WS-ASC is a panel clip that comes in variations to hold from 1/8″ to 1/2″ materials. A nylon tip set screw secures your material in place.Use HD-FDA1 and HD-PS2 to mount. (NOT INCLUDED)

name: Standoff Panel Gripper for 1/4" Material (SO-AGR-250)
brief_description: The Standoff Panel Gripper is designed to hold panels. This gripper is mounted with 5/16-18 threaded hardware which is not included and may require 3/8″ holes in your panel.Grippers can be mounted directly to a surface or used with a mounting plate. Gripper can be used with our other lines EZ-Rod & Wire or StructureLite profile.Mounting Tip: For attaching a gripper to a barrel, use a 5/8″ diameter barrel for SO-AGR-250 to 500 or a 1″ diameter barrel for SO-AGR-750.

name: Standoff Panel Gripper for 3/8" Material (SO-AGR-375)
brief_description: The Standoff Panel Gripper is designed to hold panels. This gripper is mounted with 5/16-18 threaded hardware which is not included and may require 3/8″ holes in your panel.Grippers can be mounted directly to a surface or used with a mounting plate. Gripper can be used with our other lines EZ-Rod & Wire or StructureLite profile.Mounting Tip: For attaching a gripper to a barrel, use a 5/8″ diameter barrel for SO-AGR-250 to 500 or a 1″ diameter barrel for SO-AGR-750.

name: Standoff Panel Gripper for 1/2" Material (SO-AGR-500)
brief_description: The Standoff Panel Gripper is designed to hold panels. This gripper is mounted with 5/16-18 threaded hardware which is not included and may require 3/8″ holes in your panel.Grippers can be mounted directly to a surface or used with a mounting plate. Gripper can be used with our other lines EZ-Rod & Wire or StructureLite profile.Mounting Tip: For attaching a gripper to a barrel, use a 5/8″ diameter barrel for SO-AGR-250 to 500 or a 1″ diameter barrel for SO-AGR-750.

name: Standoff Panel Gripper for 3/4" Material (SO-AGR-750)
brief_description: The Standoff Panel Gripper is designed to hold panels. This gripper is mounted with 5/16-18 threaded hardware which is not included and may require 3/8″ holes in your panel.Grippers can be mounted directly to a surface or used with a mounting plate. Gripper can be used with our other lines EZ-Rod & Wire or StructureLite profile.Mounting Tip: For attaching a gripper to a barrel, use a 5/8″ diameter barrel for SO-AGR-250 to 500 or a 1″ diameter barrel for SO-AGR-750.

name: Wall Anchor Assembly Mounting Kit
brief_description: The Wall Anchor Assembly is a threaded wall board anchor assembly with a 5/8″ long 10-24 wood hanger screw, a polypropylene anchor, and a 1/4″ long 5/16-18 thread adapter.

name: StructureLite Wall Track End Cap (SL-AWTEC)
brief_description: The StructureLite Wall Track End Cap locks into the end of StructureLite wall track with a 6-32 flat point hex socket set screw.

name: StructureLite 1-1/4" Connection Traveler (SL-ACT3)
brief_description: The StructureLite 1-1/4″ to 2-1/2″ Extrusion Traveler creates a 90-degree connection between two pieces of 1-1/4″ StructureLite.

name: StructureLite 1-1/4" Connection Traveler (SL-ACT6)
brief_description: The StructureLite 1-1/4″ Connection Traveler creates a 90-degree connection between two pieces of 1-1/4″ StructureLite.

name: StructureLite 2-1/2" Connection Travelers (SL-ACT5)
brief_description: Our StructureLite 2-1/2″ Connection Traveler connection traveler creates a 90-degree connection between two pieces of 2-1/2″ StructureLite.

name: StructureLite Ball Traveler (SL-ABT)
brief_description: The SL-ABT ball traveler holds 1-1/4″ profile and is equipped with connection cap that is tapped in 5/16-18. Profile is held in place by a nylon tip set screw.

name: StructureLite Panel Hinges
brief_description: The StructureLite Extrusion Left Hand Hinge Assembly is designed to serve as a top-left or bottom-right corner because of the screw placement.The StructureLite Extrusion Right Hand Hinge Assembly is intended to be the top-right or bottom-left corner of a StructureLite frame because of the screw position.

name: StructureLite Hinged Panel & Extrusion Gripper
brief_description: The StructureLite Hinged Panel & Extrusion Gripper assembly for 1/4″, 3/8″, 1/2″ & 3/4″ material.

name: StructureLite 1-Way Wire Hub
brief_description: The WS 1-Way Wire Hub provides a mounting point on 1-1/4″ profile for 3/64″ wire.

name: StructureLite Mounting Plate (SL-5.0AMD)
brief_description: The StructureLite Mounting Disc is a 5″ diameter mounting plate with four mounting holes and a center mounting point for a 5/16-18 low head cap screw for attachment to other parts.

name: StructureLite Round Feet 2.5" Diameter (SL-A2.5FV)
brief_description: The StructureLite 2-1/2″ Round Vinyl Foot has a 2-1/2″ diameter and a vinyl pad. This foot is threaded in 5/16-18 for attachment to other hardware.

name: StructureLite Round Feet 5" Diameter (SL-A5FV)
brief_description: The StructureLite 5″ Round Vinyl Foot features a 5/16-18 threaded hole and a clear vinyl pad.

name: #6-32 Cone Point Socket Set Screw
brief_description: Stainless steel cone point set screw with a 1/16″ hex socket, threaded in 6-32.

name: #10-24 Cone Point Socket Set Screw
brief_description: The 10-24 Cone Point Socket Set Screw has 10-24 threads and a 3/32″ hex socket.

name: #10-32 Cone Point Socket Set Screw (HD-CP6)
brief_description: The 10-32 Cone Point Socket Set Screw has 10-32 threads and a 3/32″ hex socket.

name: 1/4-28 Cone Point Socket Set Screw (HD-CP7)
brief_description: The 1/4-28 Cone Point Socket Set Screw has 1/4-28 threads and a 1/8″ hex socket. It is 1/4" long.

name: 1/4-20 Cone Point Socket Set Screw
brief_description: These cone point set screws are used to secure material in grippers. The cone point will slightly penetrate your material to ensure a tight hold. For plexiglass installations dimple, your material slightly to ensure a secure hold.

name: 5-16/18 Cone Point Socket Set Screw
brief_description: These cone point set screws are used to secure material in grippers. The cone point will slightly penetrate your material to ensure a tight hold. For plexiglass installations dimple, your material slightly to ensure a secure hold.

name: 5/16-18 Dog Point Socket Set Screw
brief_description: The 5/16-18 Dog Point Socket Set Screw is 1/4″ long and 5/16-18 threaded with a 5/32″ hex socket.

name: Standard Adjustable Edge Grip 3/4" Diameter (SO-APEG75)
description: Included HardwareSO-PEG75C, SO-PEG75B, HD-S1, HD-S001
brief_description: Our aluminum Adjustable Edge Grips mount a variety of material thicknesses. These StandOffs provide a way to mount signs, graphic panels and architectural panels to various surfaces without the need for drilling through the panel. Edge grips don’t require holes in your material and artwork or graphics can be easily changed out.3/4" diameter edge grip will hold material with a thickness of 1/8" - 1/4".Watch our installation video below where our tech lead will teach you how to install Adjustable Edge Grips.

name: Standoff Cap Contractor Pack (Set of 100)
brief_description: Our standard aluminum standoff cap is one of our most versatile products, adding a sophisticated element to signage, art, graphics or displays. We are now offering our most popular sizes — SO-CAP8 (5/8″ diameter), SO-CAP9 (1″ diameter), and SO-CAP3 (1-1/4″ diameter) — in 100 count Contractor Packs.Benefits of Contractor PacksSave with built-in bulk pricingFaster stud assemblyEase of unpacking and installation on siteKeep a shop inventory on hand, eliminating the need for separate shipmentsThis kit does not include barrels, please do not forget to purchase the barrel contractor pack separately if needed.

name: Standoff Barrel Contractor Packs (Set of 100)
brief_description: Gyford Standoff barrels mount signs, graphics, panels — and so much more — from a wall, table or counter top. Standard Gyford barrels are machined from aircraft-grade aluminum and receive a clear satin anodized finish. We are now offering our most popular sizes — SO-500 (5/8″ diameter), SO-9050 and SO-9100 (1″ diameter), and SO-1 (1 1/4″ diameter) — in 100 count Contractor Packs.Benefits of Contractor PacksSave with built-in bulk pricingFaster stud assemblyEase of unpacking and installation on siteKeep a shop inventory on hand, eliminating the need for separate shipmentsThis kit does not include caps, please do not forget to purchase your cap contractor pack separately if needed.Mounting Tip: The installation hardware is sold separately. Shop our Hardware section here for available options.
